main event: An object was observed on the ground-radar scope of the ADCC at Laredo AFB, Texas, on November 6, 1957.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 5 to 10 minutes.,The object appeared as a single bright track on the radar scope.,The object was moving in an easterly direction at an undetermined speed.,No visual sighting was made of the object.,There is debate regarding the classification of the object as unidentified.
